*WHAT IS THIS*

This torrent upload is FSX easyJet Adventures add-on for Microsoft Flight Simulator X. It provides missions (available in the "missions" section) that are for easyJet. So basically you can fly just like a real easyJet pilot! :D

P.S UPLOAD RYANAIR AND BA AND OTHER AIRLINES!!
